channel.title: Recent Blog Posts by Rob Petrin on Rob likes to code.
channel.description: Recent content in Recent Blog Posts by Rob Petrin on Rob likes to code.

item.title: 2022 Will Feel Like Mach Speed
item.description: I expect this year to be a whirlwind, which is saying something compared to the prior few years.

item.title: January is Nerd Season
item.description: As noted in my prior post, I expected a busy time in January. It hasn’t disappointed.

item.title: The Bengals are Will Win
item.description: I really want the Bengals to win, and I expect they will.
